hero.title: xMatix Incentives
hero.description1: Motivate performance. Reduce disputes. Build trust.
hero.description2: xMatix Incentives helps organizations govern incentive execution by applying clear rules, real time calculations, approvals, and visibility across incentive programs.

cardsData.title: The problem
cardsData.content: Incentive programs often suffer from manual calculations, delayed payouts, and limited transparency.
list: Rules are complex and inconsistently applied
Payout disputes consume time and trust

cardsData.title: The xMatix Approach
cardsData.content: xMatix Incentives standardizes how incentives are calculated, approved, and paid so every payout follows governed and explainable execution.

keyCapabilities.title: Core Capabilities
keyCapabilities.description2: xMatix Incentives modernizes incentive execution without replacing existing finance or payroll systems while improving accuracy, trust, and speed.

cardsData.title: Incentive Rule Execution
cardsData.description: Apply incentive plans and calculations consistently across roles and programs.

cardsData.title: Performance Based Calculations
cardsData.description: Link incentives directly to executed outcomes and verified performance data.

cardsData.title: Dispute and Adjustment Workflows
cardsData.description: Resolve payout disputes and corrections within structured and auditable processes.

cardsData.title: Finance and Payroll Alignment
cardsData.description: Ensure approved incentives flow accurately into payroll and settlements.

cardsData.title: Transparency and Auditability
cardsData.description: Provide clear visibility into incentive logic, approvals, and payouts.
